message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with information theory and source coding, which are typically covered under cs.IT. The paper also discusses rate-distortion, which is a topic in multimedia (cs.MM). The problem of multistage successive-refinement with side-information is related to the field of source coding with side-information (cs.SI). The paper also presents an upper bound for the rate-distortion function, which involves optimization and may be related to the fields of optimization and data science (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses a counterexample to a long-standing result, which may be of interest to researchers in machine learning and statistics (cs.LG).
